alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wichita and southwestern Logan Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Russell Springs, or 23 miles northwest of Scott State Lake, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Wichita and southwestern Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
